svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - December 16 2023
December 16 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
December 16, 2023" date: "2023-12-16"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade (meta EIP7569 )
‚Ä¢ Latest all core devs ‚Äì consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Devnet-12 : Prysm joined, MEV-Boost being tested Goerli
shadow fork 1 : syncing started Discussions on SSE block event for block propagation times, slashable message propagation and GossipSub
IDONTWANT control message
Latest all core devs ‚Äì consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
‚Ä¢ Devnet-12 : Prysm joined, MEV-Boost being tested
Devnet-12 : Prysm joined, MEV-Boost being tested
‚Ä¢ Goerli shadow fork 1 : syncing started
Goerli shadow fork 1 : syncing started
‚Ä¢ Discussions on SSE block event for block propagation times, slashable message propagation and GossipSub IDONTWANT control message
Discussions on SSE block event for block propagation times, slashable message propagation and GossipSub IDONTWANT control message
‚Ä¢ Dencun interop testing call video
Dencun interop testing call video
‚Ä¢ Tim Beiko‚Äôs core devs update : Dencun upgrade EIPs, EIP process changes and Prague/Electra planning
Tim Beiko‚Äôs core devs update : Dencun upgrade EIPs, EIP process changes and Prague/Electra planning
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
‚Ä¢ üö® Lido at 31.98% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
üö® Lido at 31.98% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
‚Ä¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split Consensus
layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
‚Ä¢ Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
‚Ä¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
‚Ä¢ Yoav: ERC4337 (account abstraction) vs EIP3074 (execution abstraction)
Yoav: ERC4337 (account abstraction) vs EIP3074 (execution abstraction)
‚Ä¢ Vitalik: enshrined zkEVMs at Layer 1 , tradeoffs and design challenges
Vitalik: enshrined zkEVMs at Layer 1 , tradeoffs and design challenges
‚Ä¢ Ethernets.io (node crawler): ~17k nodes found, 60% not accepting connections
Ethernets.io (node crawler): ~17k nodes found, 60% not accepting connections
‚Ä¢ Monitoreth.io (consensus layer dashboard) updated with ISP & staking entities distribution
Monitoreth.io (consensus layer dashboard) updated with ISP & staking entities distribution
For Stakers
‚Ä¢ EthStaker: DVT home staker program , pilot reimbursing hardware costs of new stakers
Client releases
‚Ä¢ Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.12.1 : patch for v1.12 block root errors ( post-mortem ) Teku v23.12.0 : adds checkpoint-sync-url option
and performance improvements
Consensus layer:
‚Ä¢ Lodestar v1.12.1 : patch for v1.12 block root errors ( post-mortem )
Lodestar v1.12.1 : patch for v1.12 block root errors ( post-mortem )
‚Ä¢ Teku v23.12.0 : adds checkpoint-sync-url option and performance improvements
Teku v23.12.0 : adds checkpoint-sync-url option and performance improvements
‚Ä¢ Execution layer Nethermind v1.24.0 : not downgradable, improvements to headers database
Execution layer
‚Ä¢ Nethermind v1.24.0 : not downgradable, improvements to headers database
Research
‚Ä¢ Timing games: cost of artificial latency in PBS
Layer 2
‚Ä¢ Arbitrum One sequencer & feed stalled during surge in traffic 90% of transactions were inscriptions
Arbitrum One sequencer & feed stalled during surge in traffic
‚Ä¢ 90% of transactions were inscriptions
‚Ä¢ RollCall (L2 standards) call video : discussed RIP7212 (secp256r1 precompile), RIP7560 (native account abstraction) and EIP3074 (AUTH &
AUTHCALL)
RollCall (L2 standards) call video : discussed RIP7212 (secp256r1 precompile), RIP7560 (native account abstraction) and EIP3074 (AUTH &
EIPs/Standards
‚Ä¢ EIPs: Meta EIP7577 : Versioning scheme for EIPs
EIPs:
‚Ä¢ Meta EIP7577 : Versioning scheme for EIPs
‚Ä¢ RIPs (Rollup Improvement Proposals): RIP7212 : Precompile for secp256r1 Curve Support (moved from EIPs)
RIPs (Rollup Improvement Proposals):
‚Ä¢ RIP7212 : Precompile for secp256r1 Curve Support (moved from EIPs)
‚Ä¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7573 : Conditional-upon-Transfer-Decryption for Delivery-versus-Payment ERC7574 : Authentication SBT using
credential ERC7575 : Partial and extended ERC4626 vaults ERC7578 : Physical asset redemption ERC7579 : Minimal modular smart accounts
ERC7580 : Inter dapp tracking interface

‚Ä¢ ERC7573 : Conditional-upon-Transfer-Decryption for Delivery-versus-Payment
ERC7573 : Conditional-upon-Transfer-Decryption for Delivery-versus-Payment

ERC7574 : Authentication SBT using credential

ERC7575 : Partial and extended ERC4626 vaults

ERC7578 : Physical asset redemption

ERC7579 : Minimal modular smart accounts

Stuff for developers
‚Ä¢ Foundry: Forge-std v1.7.4 : adds Balance, Extcodesize, Extcodehash, Extcodecopy as account access kinds and new cheat codes to delete
snapshots Polygon deployment & upgrade libraries (JavaScript), Forge Chronicles (creates JSON & markdown deployment log), Storage Delta
(compares storage layouts) & Deployer Kit (generate deployer contracts for upgradeable contracts), beta
Foundry:
‚Ä¢ Forge-std v1.7.4 : adds Balance, Extcodesize, Extcodehash, Extcodecopy as account access kinds and new cheat codes to delete snapshots
Forge-std v1.7.4 : adds Balance, Extcodesize, Extcodehash, Extcodecopy as account access kinds and new cheat codes to delete snapshots
‚Ä¢ Polygon deployment & upgrade libraries (JavaScript), Forge Chronicles (creates JSON & markdown deployment log), Storage Delta (compares
storage layouts) & Deployer Kit (generate deployer contracts for upgradeable contracts), beta
Polygon deployment & upgrade libraries (JavaScript), Forge Chronicles (creates JSON & markdown deployment log), Storage Delta (compares
‚Ä¢ Create an AMM in Vyper using Ape (Python contract dev framework)
Create an AMM in Vyper using Ape (Python contract dev framework)
‚Ä¢ Code MASTER : create AST mutators
Code MASTER : create AST mutators
‚Ä¢ EVMole v0.2.0 (function selector extractor): adds extracting function arguments
EVMole v0.2.0 (function selector extractor): adds extracting function arguments
‚Ä¢ Ponder (dapp backend framework): index events, generate GraphQL API, local dev server with hot reloading, implemented in TypeScript
Ponder (dapp backend framework): index events, generate GraphQL API, local dev server with hot reloading, implemented in TypeScript
‚Ä¢ FUZD : commit/reveal system, executes delayed transactions decrypted at execution time, alpha
FUZD : commit/reveal system, executes delayed transactions decrypted at execution time, alpha
‚Ä¢ OpenZeppelin Defender v2 , public beta, new modules: Code (analysis of PRs), Audit (track issues & resolutions), Deploy, Monitor,
Incident Response, Actions¬† & Access Control
OpenZeppelin Defender v2 , public beta, new modules: Code (analysis of PRs), Audit (track issues & resolutions), Deploy, Monitor, Incident
Response, Actions¬† & Access Control
Security
‚Ä¢ Ledger Connect Kit library supply chain attack , drainer injected into dapps
Ledger Connect Kit library supply chain attack , drainer injected into dapps
‚Ä¢ OKX DEX $370k exploit , deprecated contract compromised
OKX DEX $370k exploit , deprecated contract compromised
‚Ä¢ Hypr bridge exploit , contract reinitialized, built on fork of OP Stack develop branch
Hypr bridge exploit , contract reinitialized, built on fork of OP Stack develop branch

Ecosystem

ETH supply below Vitalik‚Äôs proposed EIP960 ETH supply cap

ETHIndia hackathon finalists
Onchain stats
‚Ä¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 16.9 to 346.6 gwei, with 41.7 gwei average Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei 15k ETH net burn
this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 16.9 to 346.6 gwei, with 41.7 gwei average
‚Ä¢ Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei

15k ETH net burn this week
‚Ä¢ ETHUSD : $2,161 - $2,385, currently $2,223
ETHUSD : $2,161 - $2,385, currently $2,223
‚Ä¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.053 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
‚Ä¢ ENS root being transferred to the ENS DAO

real time.
